alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 1:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Robeson, Florence, Dillon, Darlington, northwestern Horry, Marion, Marlboro and Williamsburg Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms generally along a line extending from near Raemon to near Kingstree. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lumberton, Bennettsville, Hartsville, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Darlington, Mullins, Red Springs, Kingstree, Pembroke, Andrews, Fairmont, Maxton, Timmonsville, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Johnsonville and Latta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 124 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 148 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
